sentences.en: a computer simulation used to train airline pilots
sentences.cn: 用于训练航空公司飞行员的电脑模拟程序

sentences.en: And would you say that computer simulation is a reliable tool?
sentences.cn: 你能说电脑模型是个可靠工具 吗 ?

sentences.en: Effect of blank holding force on forming quality was analyzed through simulation.
sentences.cn: 在此基础上,利用数值模拟技术手段,分析不同压边力条件下零件成形质量.

sentences.en: I blended a multitude of human physiognomies to create this plausible simulation.
sentences.cn: 我混合了很多人种的面相来创造了这个形象.

sentences.en: It may be an environment - simulation device such as a centrifuge or electro - mechanical vibrator.
sentences.cn: 可能是一种环境模拟装置,如离心机或机电式振动台.

sentences.en: On dynamic flight simulator, mismatch impacts mostly effect of simulation.
sentences.cn: 动态飞行仿真中错配主要影响仿真效果.

sentences.en: Pneumatic fight lever, simulation machine movement, observe the gear dynamic walking.
sentences.cn: 气动方式打击杠杆, 模拟机器动作, 观察齿轮动态走料的情况.

sentences.en: Simulation results show that the algorithm has a good equalization performance.
sentences.cn: 仿真结果表明,该算法具有很好的均衡效果.

sentences.en: The method is a direct simulation of the actual process of radiation propagation.
sentences.cn: 这种方法是辐射传输实际过程的直接模拟.

sentences.en: The pilot's skills are tested through simulation.
sentences.cn: 飞行员的技术是通过模拟飞行来检测的.

sentences.en: The results in Figs. 4 and 5 show the excellent agreement between simulation and experiment.
sentences.cn: 图4和图5的结果都表明模拟和实验是相当吻合的.

sentences.en: This model may be classified as either an optimizing model or simulation model.
sentences.cn: 这个模型可分为最佳化模型或模拟模型.

sentences.en: Tito had at that moment a nauseating weariness of simulation.
sentences.cn: 在这个时候,蒂托对于弄虚作假感到厌烦了.

sentences.en: To make the training realistic the simulation operates in real time .
sentences.cn: 为使训练真实，模拟是实时运行的。

sentences.en: Training includes realistic simulation of casualty procedures.
sentences.cn: 培训包括对急救过程的真实模拟。

sentences.en: WASP - 5 - Water quality analysis simulation pro - grams - 5, was recommended by EPA used as software of water quality model.
sentences.cn: WASP5 (Thewater qualityanalysis simulation pro-gram-5,水质分析模拟程序5), 是EPA推荐使用的水质模型软件.

trans.tran_cn: 模仿，模拟，[生]拟态，拟色，假装，装病
trans.tran_en: the activity of producing conditions which are similar to real ones, especially in order to test something, or the conditions that are produced
